attributes.action: Order Basildon Council to quash the charge for permits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Basildon Council set up a residents parking scheme, in a bid to deter commuters from parking outside residents homes.
The council said that commuters would have to use the towns car parks and the extra revenue from this parking would cover the cost of the permit scheme.
A year or so later the council started an admin charge of of £2 and now it is £25 per year. A various zone permit for a company car, ie electrician or plumber has just risen from £40 a year to £150 per year.
They are robbing residents and small companies and this has to be stopped now!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
